entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
